description: '''The White Tie Affair''' (also known as '''TWTA''') is an American [[pop music|pop]] band from [[Chicago]], [[Illinois]], made up of vocalist [[Chris Wallace (musician)|Chris Wallace]], guitarist Sean-P, drummer Tim McLaughlin and keyboardist Ryan McLain. In early 2007, the band signed with [[Epic Records]]/Slightly Dangerous and released their debut album, ''[[Walk This Way (album)|Walk This Way]],'' in April 2008. The album contains the band's two singles, "Allow Me to Introduce Myself...Mr. Right" and "[[Candle (Sick and Tired)]]", which have been featured on [[MTV]]'s ''[[Total Request Live|TRL]]'' and ''[[The Hills (TV series)|The Hills]]''
